member.name: T:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile
member.summary: Represents one complete collection of midi events from a file - standard midi or yamaha style files. Writes subsets to various output formats.

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile._includeNoisy
member.summary: Include events like controller changes, pitch wheel, ...

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile._patterns
member.summary: All the file pattern sections. Plain midi files will have only one, unnamed.

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile._currentPattern
member.summary: Currently collecting this pattern.

member.summary: Supported file types.

member.summary: Supported file types.

member.summary: What midi type is it.

member.summary: How many tracks.

member.summary: Original resolution for all events.

member.summary: Tempo supplied by file.

member.summary: Time signature, if supplied by file. Default is 4/4.

member.summary: Read a file.
member.param: Specified by client in case not in the file.

member.summary: Get the pattern by name.
member.returns: The pattern. Throws if name not found.

member.summary: Writes to various output formats.

member.summary: Export the contents in a csv readable form. This is as the events appear in the original file.

member.summary: Export pattern parts to individual midi files. This is as the events appear in the original file.

member.name: T:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo
member.summary: Represents the contents of a midi file pattern. If it is a plain midi file (not style) there will be one only. Time is converted from midi to internal.

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo._events
member.summary: All the pattern midi events.

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo._eventsByTime
member.summary: All the pattern midi events, key is when to play (scaled time).

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo._mt
member.summary: For scaling subs to internal.

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo._channelPatches
member.summary: Collection of all channels in this pattern. Key is number, value is associated patch.

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo._hasNotes
member.summary: Channels with real notes.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.PatternName
member.summary: Pattern name. Empty indicates single pattern aka plain midi file.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.Tempo
member.summary: Tempo, if supplied by file. Default indicates invalid which will be filled in during read.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.TimeSignature
member.summary: Time signature, if supplied by file.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Use only for initialization!

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Normal constructor.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.AddEvent(NAudio.Midi.MidiEvent)
member.summary: Add an event to the collection. Note!! this replaces the original file AbsoluteTime with the value scaled for internal use.

member.summary: Get enumerator for events using supplied filters.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.GetEventsWhen(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all events at a specific scaled time.

member.summary: Get an ordered list of channels and their patches.

member.summary: Get the patch associated with the channel.
member.returns: The patch or -1 if invalid channel

member.summary: Remove a channel from the channel/patches collection.

member.summary: Safely add/update info.
